Reviews.Title: Great Phone Intuitive and Capable.
Reviews.Author: frobate
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my Dash 3G that got damaged. I have owned T-Mobile Dash phones since they were released and they are great little smartphones.

Reviews.Title: 1 big joke never !!! Seller gets 0 for a rating
Reviews.Author: GTO/EXPRESS
Reviews.Content: Seller is a joke never sent me my package!!! Seller took my payment never answer1of my 3 or more emails I order on april23/2011 since then I have order from 3 other sellers on may15 recieved items in 3 days to 5 good! Dont order from sellers just launchin beware!!! when u order a item it should ship within 24 to 36 hours or thats a red flag so beware buyer GTO EXPRESS OUT!!!  Phone good owned 1 before 4 stars for phone

Reviews.Title: I like It. I'm Still Using it.
Reviews.Author: D.D.
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone. It's really hard to type A's now but otherwise is good. Would I recommend it? No.

Reviews.Title: solid phone, running T-Mobile & upgraded to windows mobile 6.5
Reviews.Author: W. Richmond "AZBuyer2007"
Reviews.Content: had this phone for over 1 year. its been very stable. and runs well on windows mobile 6.5.kind of sad that windows moible 7 & 8 stopped supporting activesync. so looking around for another older-style phone.one minor issue i had was that the auto-dial feature kicked randomly when i had the headset plugged in via the USB adapter module.not a big deal though, as I just dont use headset that often.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Rocketman59
Reviews.Content: I had this phone one year was sold at the T Mobil in the mall company store was told it was a blackberry it is not,the programs on the web have great difficulty downloading most of the time it freezes,the biggest issue is the track ball.It fails to work the web or showing text messages.The warranty just ran out and of course it will cost more to repair than it's worth.Go on the web look up trouble with dash track ball.Stay away from this thing.

Reviews.Title: T-Moble Dash 3g
Reviews.Author: Russell
Reviews.Content: This is working as it should, great reception, voice quality superb and the cost for it being an unlocked phone couldn't be beat
